price: (24) [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
